data.title: Revco Definition
data.meta_description: Define Revco. means Revco D.S., Inc., its directors, officers, employees, agents and representatives, predecessors, successors, and assigns; its subsidiaries, divisions, groups, and affiliates controlled, directly or indirectly, by Revco, and the respective directors, officers, employees, agents and representatives, successors, and assigns of each.
data.text:
